A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I may come back to write a full review\, but for now\, this is to combat the crazy low ratings from an apparently heavily divided fan base. This movie had it's issues\, but it was the most Star Warsy movie we've had since Jedi. I think people are just too caught up in what they thought the film was going to be. Some of the surprise reveals were that there was no reveal at all\, and I thought it was brilliant. *shrugs*
